Lithographer: Lithography by Knapp & Company (American, New York)
Dimensions: Overall (Cover and verso one-sheet) 2 3/4 × 2 7/8 in. (7 × 7.3 cm)
Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Miniature booklets from the "Histories of Generals" series (N78), issued in a set of 50 booklets in 1888 to promote W. Duke Sons & Co. brand cigarettes. Each booklet consists of 16 pages with covers.
